title: Service Order Creation Wizard - Successful Completion
description: Verify that a user can complete the 4-step service order creation wizard successfully with valid client, vehicle, assessment, tasks, and review data, resulting in a correctly saved service order with accurate associations.

steps.description: Navigate to new service order creation page
Select existing client or create new client with valid information
Select existing vehicle or register new vehicle with valid details and use OCR plate scanner for license plate recognition
Complete the assessment sheet with valid evaluation inputs
Add tasks to the service order with valid task types, pricing, and assignment to operators
Review summary details and submit the service order
Verify the service order is saved with correct data and task associations
Verify status tracking and history logs are initialized correctly

title: Service Order Creation Wizard - Validation Errors
description: Verify appropriate validations and error messages occur when required fields are missing or invalid during service order creation wizard steps.

steps.description: Navigate to service order creation wizard
Attempt to proceed without selecting or creating a client
Verify validation error is shown for missing client
Attempt to proceed without vehicle information
Verify validation error is shown for missing vehicle
Input invalid task pricing or omit task assignment
Verify validation errors prevent progressing and clarify required corrections

title: OCR License Plate Scanner - Successful Plate Recognition
description: Verify that the OCR license plate scanner correctly recognizes and auto-fills vehicle license plate during vehicle registration with high confidence results.

steps.description: Navigate to vehicle registration form
Open plate scanner and capture image of a vehicle's license plate
Verify OCR processes the image and populates license plate input field with recognized plate
Verify confidence score is above acceptable threshold
Manually correct plate if OCR result is inaccurate
Verify manual input overrides OCR suggestion

title: Invoice OCR Processing - Accurate Data Extraction and Validation
description: Verify that when uploading an invoice image, the AI-powered OCR extracts supplier, item names, quantities, and prices with high confidence, and allows user validation or correction of extracted data before inventory update.

steps.description: Navigate to receive invoice upload page
Upload a clear image of supplier invoice
Verify extracted supplier and invoice items appear pre-filled with confidence scores
Review and validate or edit extracted item details including quantities and prices
Confirm or create new products if suggested items do not match existing catalog
Submit validated invoice data to update inventory stock and record stock movement
Verify inventory reflects new stock correctly associated to products and vehicles if applicable
Verify stock movement logs accurately record the transaction

title: Task Execution and Time Tracking by Operator
description: Verify that an operator can view assigned tasks, start and stop timers correctly, add media and observations, mark tasks as complete, and the system records times and statuses properly.

steps.description: Login as operator role
Open assigned task within a service order
Start the task timer
Add observations text and attach photos or videos using in-app camera functionality
Stop the task timer
Mark task as completed with appropriate status
Verify recorded time matches timer duration and task status is updated
Verify media is linked and accessible from the task record

title: Inventory Stock Allocation to Vehicle with Stock Verification
description: Verify system behavior when allocating parts from inventory to a vehicle service, including verifying stock availability, reserving parts, updating vehicle-specific allocations, and reflecting stock movement records.

steps.description: Open allocation interface and select vehicle and associated service order
Search and select products to allocate
Verify that stock availability is checked and insufficient stock prevents allocation
Allocate available parts, confirming reservation
Verify vehicle-specific stock allocation is updated correctly
Verify inventory stock reflects reserved quantities and stock movement is logged

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that each user role (admin, stock_manager, operator, finance, viewer) has correct permissions enforced for data access, action availability, and UI element visibility, including financial data masking for unauthorized roles.

steps.description: Login as admin and verify full access to all features and data, including price viewing and user management
Login as stock_manager and verify ability to manage inventory but no access to financial data or user management
Login as operator and verify ability to execute assigned tasks but no access to stock management or finance data
Login as finance user and verify access to financial data and invoice processing but restricted from service order task execution
Login as viewer and verify read-only access with price and financial data masked or hidden
Verify UI components and routes enforce role-specific access restrictions
Verify financial values are masked or not displayed for unauthorized roles

title: Scheduling System - Appointment Creation and Notification Triggering
description: Verify that appointments can be created manually and automatically linked to service deadlines. Configured notifications trigger correctly based on appointment settings.

steps.description: Navigate to scheduling interface
Create manual appointment specifying date, time, and linked service order
Verify appointment is saved and linked to service order deadline
Create automatic appointment triggered by service deadline configuration
Verify automatic appointment appears in schedule appropriately
Configure notification settings for appointment reminders
Verify notifications are sent as configured when appointment time approaches

title: Client and Vehicle Profile Management with History Tracking
description: Verify that clients and vehicles can be registered, searched, and edited with detailed profiles, including history tracking of associated service orders and vehicle stock allocations.

steps.description: Navigate to client management tab
Create new client with valid details
Search for existing clients using partial and full matches
Verify search results are relevant and accurate
Open client profile and verify associated vehicles and service order history are listed
Edit client and vehicle details and save changes
Verify updated information persists and reflects in related modules

title: Responsive UI and Visual Feedback Validation
description: Verify the user interface adapts properly on various mobile and desktop screen sizes, and UI elements provide consistent visual feedback including cards, badges, gradients, and glass-morphism effects.

steps.description: Open application on desktop browser and verify layout structure including header, sidebar, and main content
Verify UI uses cards, badges, and gradients consistently
Open application on various mobile screen sizes and orientations
Verify layout adjusts with mobile-first design principles, such as mobile bottom navigation presence and sidebar hiding
Interact with actionable UI controls like buttons and input fields
Verify feedback on hover, focus, and click states is consistent and accessible

title: Custom Evaluation Templates - Creation, Editing, and Pricing
description: Verify users can create and edit customizable evaluation templates, organize sections and service types, attach multimedia, and configure pricing controls properly.

steps.description: Navigate to template management interface
Create a new evaluation template with multiple sections and service types
Attach images or other allowed multimedia to template sections
Configure pricing rules or fixed prices within template items
Save and preview the evaluation template within service order assessments
Verify template sections and multimedia appear correctly and pricing calculations function as expected
Edit an existing template and verify updates persist

title: Printable Reports - Service Orders and Client Histories
description: Verify printable reports generate correctly formatted documents for service orders, client histories, and inspection sheets including workshop branding and consistent formatting.

steps.description: Open a completed service order and select print report option
Verify the printed report contains accurate service order details, status timeline, and associated tasks
Open a client profile and select print client history report
Verify printed client report summarizes all past service orders and vehicle information
Print an evaluation/inspection sheet from a service order
Verify inspection sheet formatting is clear and includes all inputted evaluation data

title: Error Handling and User-Friendly Messages
description: Verify that global and component-level error boundaries capture unexpected errors, display user-friendly error messages, and prevent application crashes or blank screens.

steps.description: Simulate an unexpected error in a core component (e.g., service order fetching fails)
Verify that an error boundary is triggered and a friendly error message is shown to the user
Navigate to various pages with simulated network failures or invalid data
Verify error handling prevents UI breakage and informs the user appropriately
